basics.name: Johan Berglund
basics.label: Leader, Agile Coach and DevOps Advocate
basics.summary:
I am a tech-savvy servant leader with a relentless passion for personal growth and development. With extensive experience in agile methodologies, DevOps, and team leadership, I have a proven track record of driving organizational transformation and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

I firmly believe in the power of collaboration and teamwork, understanding that we achieve our greatest successes when we work together. My background include leadership roles in software development, IT operations and agile organizations. I have trained and coached hundreds of professionals in agile practices. I bring a unique blend of technical expertise from both software engineering as well as IT operations, agile leadership and a commitment to delivering results, making me a valuable asset for any organization seeking to thrive in the fast-paced world of technology and innovation.
